body_html:
@soumith
Hi, I'm using Fedora 23, cuda 7.5, cudnn 4 and Titan X - Maxwell.
When I wanted to install Pytorch from source, I faced also:
nvcc fatal : Unsupported gpu architecture 'compute_60'
that should not be accrued using Maxwell version.
I have much more problems with installing Cuda 8.0 on my system (system crash).
Is there any alternative solution for my situation except installing Cuda 8.0?

body:
@soumith 
Hi, I'm using Fedora 23, cuda 7.5, cudnn 4 and Titan X - Maxwell.
When I wanted to install Pytorch from source, I faced also:
nvcc fatal   : Unsupported gpu architecture 'compute_60'
that should not be accrued using Maxwell version.
I have much more problems with installing Cuda 8.0 on my system (system crash).
Is there any alternative solution for my situation except installing Cuda 8.0?
